summary: This is an external email forwarded to the FBI, dated March 3, 2021, with the subject 'Ernst & friends'. It contains an image attachment and appears to reference social media profiles and locations, including Switzerland. The content is fragmented and seems to be a forwarded or captured social media post.
keyFacts: An email with the subject 'Ernst & friends' was forwarded to the FBI on March 3, 2021.
The email contains an image attachment named 'IMG_2642.jpg' and references social media profiles.
The email mentions a location in Switzerland: 'Ber&igen, Switzerland' (likely a typo for 'Berlingen' or similar).
The email is marked as external and appears to be a forwarded social media post or check-in.
The fragmented text includes references to Facebook, photos, albums, and check-ins.
